verses.name: Judges 7:21
verses.text: And they stood every man in his place round about the camp: and all the host ran, and cried, and fled.

verses.name: Judges 7:22
verses.text: And the three hundred blew the trumpets, and the Lord set every man’s sword against his fellow, even throughout all the host: and the host fled to Beth–shittah in Zererath, and to the border of Abel–meholah, unto Tabbath.

verses.name: Judges 7:23
verses.text: And the men of Israel gathered themselves together out of Naphtali, and out of Asher, and out of all Manasseh, and pursued after the Midianites.
